title: Home
heading: Troy Forster
introText:
I craft innovative tech
solutions that solve
complex business
challenges
summary: Probably some SEO stuff can go here
body1:
_Creative Technology Director, idea factory, tinkerer, cyclist, hiker, vegetarian living in the wilds of downtown Toronto_

- Born in London, England and emigrated to Canada with my parents at the age of 10.
- Vegetarian since I was 20 (and no, I have never missed meat)    
- Love human-powered outdoor sports    
- Successful kidney transplant in 2005    
- Had a paper route at 11    
- Had a neighbourhood grass cutting business at 13    
- Worked in a children's zoo at 15 feeding bears, beavers, lemurs, otters, pigs and squirrel monkies   
- Have waited tables, landscaped and laboured on construction sites    
- Spent the last 30+ years in the technology world. I started as a developer and have been a technical director since 2010.    
- Roadtripped across Canada to both West and East coasts    
- Spent time in Colombia, France, Greece, Mexico and Switzerland     
- Love cooking and trying new foods. Indian is still one of my all-time favourites.    
- Played the keyboardist for boy band "The Pragmatic Virgins" in 1992's [Hurt Penguins](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0104465/)
- And yes ladies, I am single
body2:
- Rock climbing
- Ice climbing
- Cycling
- Mountain biking
- Cross-country skiing
- Snowshoeing
- Running
- Trail running
- Hiking
- Canoe/Kayaking
- Sailing
- Co-founder of The Screaming Carrots race team
- Competed in dozens of 24 hour mountain bike relay races, 100Km enduros as well as 8 hour, 12 hour and multi-day adventure races
- Created the exclusive SCAR (Screaming Carrots Adventure Race) series

clients.name: BDC. The bank for Canadian entrepreneurs.
Burson. The global leader in communications purpose-built to create value for their clients through reputation

Corus Entertainment. Corus is a driving force in the media industry with a diverse portfolio of strong brands that entertain and inform audiences through great storytelling and compelling content, reaching millions of people around the world every day

GSK: A focused biopharma company with strong momentum and big ambitions, to unite science, technology and talent to get ahead of disease together. They aim to positively impact the health of 2.5 billion people by the end of the decade, as a successful, growing company where people can thrive.
Journeyman. Well travelled and trusted Canadian video production company.

National PR: National Public Relations is Canada's leading public relations firm, servicing clients across a wide range of sectors including healthcare, manufacturing, energy, financial services, transportation and technology, with offices in Vancouver, Calgary, Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal, Quebec City, Saint John, Halifax and St

Ontario Ministry of Labour: Helping protect workers and settle workplace disputes, supporting skilled trades, apprenticeships and employment services, attracting highly-skilled newcomers and helping people get settled in Ontario.
Orbyt Media: Canada’s premiere content syndication group, providing access to the World’s Largest Talent and Best in Class broadcast services to over 450 stations in 155 markets across the country.
Travelex. One of the market leading specialist providers of foreign exchange.
Velcro: The inventors of the Original VELCRO® Brand hook and loop fastener more than 60 years ago
Yellow Tail: Wines for any occasion.
